channel.title: Blog on ENDARI
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on ENDARI

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Testing Let’s begine Some text This is a paragraph of text, with important and semi important words. do I need to wrap my text with enters, or it will be aligned as justified? who knows! now lets write some lists and code blocks and quotes: Some list Things to do: read the documentation. find a good subject to write about write the blog polish and publish And now some code def averager(*args: int) -> float: return sum(args) / len(args) A picture to show what i do whenever I start!

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.
